events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I want a refund immediately.
The customer's message indicates they want a refund for their recent purchase, categorizing the case as a refund request.
Case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used?
My order number is 897654321 and no, I have not opened the package. I want a full refund as soon as possible.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund request. You should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Great, thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and will consider shopping here again.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your account after a few days to confirm receipt.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us if you have any other questions or concerns.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process.
